title: [COYS - 百屌成才Lamela] 熱刺球迷吹水區 70

replies.msg:
COME ON YOU SPURS



熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會主場為白鹿徑球場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」








(部份圖片由淫心黃黃巴打提供)


榮耀：

甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984

中場
Dier 契仔二號 但事實無你打防中係差好遠既 尤其wym未fit 仲有唔好成日打中堅好無
Dembele 下季應該唔出得太多場 希望買返個真係有級數既中場中 咁就可以用你黎打歐聯
Wanyama 操fit返先啦 呢排d狀態都唔太掂 但fit返都唔見得有長期正選
Winks 傷好絕對有得爭正選 如果唔買中中 又唔傷咁多 可以打聯賽正選
Sissoko 契仔三號 真係好平庸 係貪你咩位都可以打 攝你落去
Lamela 契仔四號 唔好扮勁啦屌你 人上腳你上腳 我都踢得好過你
Lucas 下季有潛質爆發 因為son季初無得打 應該多左機會出場 尤其肥普踢順左個陣就唔會大執
Eriksen 賣走你我以後反利維同肥普 除非你買兩個美斯返黎頂 下季可能要試下打中場中 我覺得呢個位你一定打到 仲可以好過dembele
Alli 契仔五號 今季好似差左 如果下季比個攻中你打 生性ok?
Son 今季carry左好多場 但下季好大機會跌watt 睇下九月踢完亞運返黎有無得抖啦 如果右邊都有個同你同類型就好 唔洗成日見到d閘拉邊

結論：買中場中

前鋒
Kane 你值得加人工 但覺得你心態好似唔同左 開始有南美果種陰濕茅既DNA

波切蒂諾執教熱刺這幾年一直遵守著列維的規則，並接受俱樂部無法在財力上匹敵其他爭四對手的事實。但在晉級下賽季的歐冠正賽後，波切蒂諾希望能夠帶領熱刺更進一步，將熱刺打造成一支有實力贏得冠軍的球隊。而其中的核心就是留住隊內的明星球員，凱恩、阿里、埃裏克森、維爾通亨、戴爾和洛裏斯都將得到新合同。

除此之外，波切蒂諾還希望得到更多的轉會資金來更新球隊陣容，他希望自己可以出售任何可被替代的球員，阿爾德韋雷爾德、丹尼-羅斯和穆薩-登貝萊都被允許離開球隊，因此熱刺需要資金來填補他們的空缺，萬亞馬、略倫特和穆薩-西索科在隊內的未來也充滿不確定性。

水晶宮邊鋒紮哈是波切蒂諾非常欣賞的一名球員，要想引進這名科特迪瓦國腳熱刺需要準備5000萬英鎊的轉會費，富勒姆小將塞塞尼翁也是熱刺非常感興趣的一名球員，但他的轉會費也不會低於5000萬英鎊。波切蒂諾還一直在關註著曼聯邊鋒馬夏爾，本菲卡租借至亞特蘭大的中場克裏斯坦特、皇馬中場科瓦契奇也是熱刺的考察對象。

波切蒂諾計劃在本周與熱刺主席列維會談，俱樂部老板、億萬富翁劉易斯也很可能參與其中，他們希望在搬入新球場前讓熱刺成為更好的球隊，這次會議也將決定波切蒂諾能否得到俱樂部高層的支持。波切蒂諾希望俱樂部能夠盡快做決定，而不是拖到夏季轉會窗口的最後幾周，熱刺此前曾因此吃虧不少。

去年夏天列維在沃克5000萬英鎊加盟曼城前沒有任何動作，波切蒂諾不希望球隊今年繼續這樣的操作。波切蒂諾還擔心隊內的明星球員被其他球隊吸引，如果世界杯前無法完成續約，其他歐洲豪門會對熱刺眾將展開追逐。波切蒂諾本人也不缺少追求者，如果他不願意留在熱刺，會有多家英超和歐洲豪門俱樂部向他發出邀請，皇馬、切爾西、尤文圖斯和拜仁慕尼黑都很欣賞阿根廷人的工作。
波切蒂諾在球隊5-4險勝萊斯特城的賽後說道：“我們和俱樂部之間有很多要聊的，我很清楚球隊要做什麽，但我不知道俱樂部是否認可我的觀點。我們會談判討論新項目，一起思考讓球隊變強的辦法，我想主席列維說了算，我們一起度過了愉快的4年，我們需要重新評估這段歲月了。如果我們想成為真正的大賽冠軍候選，我們需要好好檢討一下自己。

“首先我需要和列維聊聊，然後才知道接下去會怎麽做，現在我們還無法談論未來，我相信列維會聽我的，但你也知道我有時候會有一些瘋狂的想法。有時候你需要勇敢一些，在球隊現在的情況下，我們擁有很多狂熱的球迷，勇敢和冒險是必要的。我想現在俱樂部需要冒險一些，比以往更加努力讓球隊重新呈現競爭力。”

19歲的「小古華特」已拒絕了球會開出的新合約，離隊想法可見一斑，而阿積士亦表示，熱刺確實提出斟介︰「他們建議可先完成交易，但讓他留在阿積士多2年才離開，但我們沒有跟進，因為球會想與他續約。」

不過「小古華特」對於球隊的器重並不十分高興，並批評CEO雲達沙及總監奧華馬斯「想點就點」︰「我在最後一分鐘才聽到這消息，這不關球會的事，是涉事的話事人，經常只懂在開玩笑，他們想怎樣便怎樣。」

So here is a roundup of the press stories relating to Spurs today. Pinch of salt required in places for sure.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino's plea to club hierarchy to be brave this summer in the transfer market appears to have been granted with the club moving quickly to try and secure transfer targets early in the window.

(Daily Mirror)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Manchester United are confident they can sign Toby Alderweireld from Tottenham this summer with the North London club keen to sell.

(Daily Mirror)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Chelsea having given up in their pursuit of Mauricio Pochettino after being told he would not ever consider leaving Tottenham for a local rival.

(The Sun)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Mousa Dembele is said to be considering a mega money deal to move to China after the World Cup.

(The Sun)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Daniel Levy is fearing a Liverpool win in the Champions League final could see Tottenham lose their manager to Real Madrid. The Argentine has held positive talks with the chairman but is seemingly more and more frustrated by Tottenhams financial position. Real Madrid have Pochettino as their number one target should they decide to sack their current manager.

(Marca)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Pochettino has put Colombian midfield enforcer Wilmar Barrios on his summer transfer target list as he looks to add more bite and options in the Spurs midifeld. Barrios, 24, plays in Argentina for Boca and has been selected for Colombia at the world cup.

(The Sun)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Tottenham are in negotiations with Real Madrid to re sign Gareth Bale for a deal in the region of £48m. The only stumbling block is the players wage demands believed to be in the region of £350,000 a week.

(Daily Star)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Tottenham are close to agreement over a deal for Barcelona teenager Riqui Puig. The 18-year-old has failed to agree terms with the Spanish champions over a new contract and is keen to move to London and link up with Mauricio Pochettino. Puig, who turns 19 in August is highly rated in Spain.

(Daily Mail)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Frank Lampard has called on Gareth Southgate to name Harry Kane has England captain claiming he is a 'talisman' for the nation much like Alan Shearer was.

(BT Sports)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Spurs will be watching the Championship play off final with great interest as their hopes to sign Ryan Sessegnon could rest on Fulham failing to win promotion. Should the Cottagers make their Premier League return the player is said to be happy at Fulham.

(Sky Sports News)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Stories from the press & media on Sunday 20th May 2018.

So here is a roundup of the press stories relating to Spurs today. Pinch of salt required in places for sure.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino's plea to club hierarchy to be brave this summer in the transfer market appears to have been granted with the club moving quickly to try and secure transfer targets early in the window.

(Daily Mirror)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Manchester United are confident they can sign Toby Alderweireld from Tottenham this summer with the North London club keen to sell.

(Daily Mirror)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Chelsea having given up in their pursuit of Mauricio Pochettino after being told he would not ever consider leaving Tottenham for a local rival.

(The Sun)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Mousa Dembele is said to be considering a mega money deal to move to China after the World Cup.

(The Sun)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Daniel Levy is fearing a Liverpool win in the Champions League final could see Tottenham lose their manager to Real Madrid. The Argentine has held positive talks with the chairman but is seemingly more and more frustrated by Tottenhams financial position. Real Madrid have Pochettino as their number one target should they decide to sack their current manager.

(Marca)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Pochettino has put Colombian midfield enforcer Wilmar Barrios on his summer transfer target list as he looks to add more bite and options in the Spurs midifeld. Barrios, 24, plays in Argentina for Boca and has been selected for Colombia at the world cup.

(The Sun)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Tottenham are in negotiations with Real Madrid to re sign Gareth Bale for a deal in the region of £48m. The only stumbling block is the players wage demands believed to be in the region of £350,000 a week.

(Daily Star)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Tottenham are close to agreement over a deal for Barcelona teenager Riqui Puig. The 18-year-old has failed to agree terms with the Spanish champions over a new contract and is keen to move to London and link up with Mauricio Pochettino. Puig, who turns 19 in August is highly rated in Spain.

(Daily Mail)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Frank Lampard has called on Gareth Southgate to name Harry Kane has England captain claiming he is a 'talisman' for the nation much like Alan Shearer was.

(BT Sports)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Spurs will be watching the Championship play off final with great interest as their hopes to sign Ryan Sessegnon could rest on Fulham failing to win promotion. Should the Cottagers make their Premier League return the player is said to be happy at Fulham.

(Sky Sports News)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Stories from the press & media on Sunday 20th May 2018.

左閘丹尼路斯認為，熱刺應該盡量滿足領隊普捷天奴的要求。

熱刺今季從英超亞軍跌至第3位，在英足盃、英聯盃、歐聯都失望而回，再嘗一個無冠球季。盛傳普捷天奴跟主席利維就今夏轉會資金一事鬧不和，前者認為球會是時候大灑金錢增兵，以求更上一層樓。

丹尼路斯（Danny Rose）就力撐普帥：「我希望領隊、教練團隊、轉會負責人、主席都可以團結一致，給予領隊希望要的東西。我希望球隊能夠有很好的增兵，幫助我們繼續前進，就像領隊所說，下一步就是贏得冠軍。」

不過，路斯下季是否仍留在熱刺也是未知之數，他們今季曾受傷患困擾，而且正選左閘席位已被賓戴維斯奪去，只曾上陣17次。路斯說：「今季我一直要保持耐性及正面態度。這是團隊的比賽，我和賓戴維斯下季都會努力爭取正選。」

Rose迷普again
